name: Ladder stacker
description:
In ladder stacker, you need good reflexes and timing to pass through platforms and reach the end of the level... and all this using only ladders!

The objective of the game is simple: click and hold to build the ladder. The longer you keep holding the taller it will get.
As soon as you think it's high enough, release the click. If the ladder’s length is ideal, it will fall onto the next platform, forming a bridge, so you can cross it.

The more accurate your reflex is, the more points and more levels you will conquer.
